com.nfcalarmclock

Class NacMediaPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.media.MediaPlayer
      • com.nfcalarmclock.media.NacMediaPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.media.AudioManager.OnAudioFocusChangeListener, android.media.AudioRouting, android.media.MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, android.media.VolumeAutomation

    public class NacMediaPlayer
extends android.media.MediaPlayer
implements android.media.MediaPlayer.OnCompletionListener, android.media.AudioManager.OnAudioFocusChangeListener
    Wrapper for the MediaPlayer class.

      • pauseWrapper

        public int pauseWrapper()
        Pause the media player.

      • play

        public void play(NacAlarm alarm,
                 boolean repeat,
                 boolean shuffle)
        Play the media associated with the given alarm. This can play an entire directory (playlist) or a single media file.
        Parameters:
        alarm - The alarm to get the media path from.
        repeat - Whether the media should be repeated or not.
        shuffle - Whether the media should be shuffled or not. This only applies to directories (playlists).

      • play

        public void play(android.net.Uri contentUri,
                 boolean repeat)
        Play the media with the given Uri.
        Parameters:
        contentUri - The Uri of the content to play.
        repeat - Whether the media should be repeated or not.
